verses.verse: <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to the <S%H5637>rebellious<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, that <S%H6213>take<s%> <S%H6098>counsel<s%>, but not of <S%H5258>me<s%>; and that cover with a <S%H4541>covering<s%>, but not of my <S%H7307>spirit<s%>, that they may <S%H5595>add<s%> <S%H2403>sin<s%> to <S%H2403>sin<s%>:

That <S%H1980>walk<s%> to go <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and have not <S%H7592>asked<s%> at my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; to <S%H5810>strengthen<s%> themselves in the <S%H4581>strength<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and to <S%H2620>trust<s%> in the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>!
Therefore shall the <S%H4581>strength<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> be your <S%H1322>shame<s%>, and the <S%H2622>trust<s%> in the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> your <S%H3639>confusion<s%>.
For his <S%H8269>princes<s%> were at <S%H6814>Zoan<s%>, and his <S%H4397>ambassadors<s%> <S%H5060>came<s%> to <S%H2609>Hanes<s%>.

They were all <S%H3001>ashamed<s%> of a <S%H5971>people<s%> that could not <S%H3276>profit<s%> <S%H5828>them<s%>, nor be a help nor <S%H3276>profit<s%>, but a <S%H1322>shame<s%>, and also a <S%H2781>reproach<s%>.

The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H929>animals<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%>: into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%> and <S%H6695>anguish<s%>, from from where come the <S%H3833>young<s%> and old <S%H3918>lion<s%>, the <S%H660>viper<s%> and <S%H8314>fiery<s%> <S%H5774>flying<s%> <S%H8314>serpent<s%>, they will <S%H5375>carry<s%> their <S%H2428>riches<s%> upon the <S%H3802>shoulders<s%> of young <S%H5895>donkeys<s%>, and their <S%H214>treasures<s%> upon the <S%H1707>bunches<s%> of <S%H1581>camels<s%>, to a <S%H5971>people<s%> that shall not profit <S%H3276>them<s%>.

For the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> shall <S%H5826>help<s%> in <S%H1892>vain<s%>, and to no <S%H7385>purpose<s%>: therefore have I <S%H7121>cried<s%> concerning <S%H2063>this<s%>, <S%H1992>Their<s%> <S%H7293>strength<s%> is to sit <S%H7674>still<s%>.

Now <S%H935>go<s%>, <S%H3789>write<s%> it before them in a <S%H3871>table<s%>, and <S%H2710>note<s%> it in a <S%H5612>book<s%>, that it may be for the <S%H3117>time<s%> to <S%H314>come<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5703>ever<s%> and <S%H5769>ever<s%>:

That this is a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H3586>lying<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H1121>sons<s%> that <S%H14>will<s%> not <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>:

Which <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H7200>seers<s%>, <S%H7200>See<s%> <S%H2374>not<s%>; and to the prophets, <S%H2372>Prophesy<s%> not unto us right <S%H5229>things<s%>, <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto us smooth <S%H2513>things<s%>, <S%H2372>prophesy<s%> <S%H4123>deceits<s%>:

Get you <S%H5493>out<s%> of the <S%H1870>way<s%>, turn <S%H5186>aside<s%> out of the <S%H734>path<s%>, cause the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%> from before <S%H6440>us<s%>.

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Because you <S%H3988>despise<s%> this <S%H1697>word<s%>, and <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H6233>oppression<s%> and <S%H3868>perverseness<s%>, and stay in <S%H8172>it<s%>:

Therefore this <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> shall be to you as a <S%H6556>breach<s%> ready to <S%H5307>fall<s%>, swelling <S%H1158>out<s%> in a <S%H7682>high<s%> <S%H2346>wall<s%>, whose <S%H7667>breaking<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> at a <S%H6621>instant<s%>.

And he shall <S%H7665>break<s%> it as the <S%H7667>breaking<s%> of the <S%H3335>potters<s%>' <S%H5035>vessel<s%> that is broken in <S%H3807>pieces<s%>; he shall not <S%H2550>spare<s%>: so that there shall not be <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H4386>bursting<s%> of it a <S%H2789>shard<s%> to <S%H2846>take<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> from the <S%H3344>hearth<s%>, or to <S%H2834>take<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> with out of the <S%H1360>pit<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>, the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; In <S%H7729>returning<s%> and <S%H5183>rest<s%> shall you be <S%H3467>saved<s%>; in <S%H8252>quietness<s%> and in <S%H985>confidence<s%> shall be your <S%H1369>strength<s%>: and you would <S%H14>not<s%>.

But you <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5127>No<s%>; for we will flee upon <S%H5483>horses<s%>; therefore shall you <S%H5127>flee<s%>: <S%H7392>and<s%>, We will ride upon the <S%H7031>swift<s%>; therefore shall they that <S%H7291>pursue<s%> you be <S%H7043>swift<s%>.

<S%H259>One<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> shall flee <S%H6440>at<s%> the <S%H1606>rebuke<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%>; <S%H6440>at<s%> the <S%H1606>rebuke<s%> of <S%H2568>five<s%> shall you <S%H5127>flee<s%>: until you be <S%H3498>left<s%> as a <S%H8650>beacon<s%> upon the <S%H7218>top<s%> of a <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, and as a <S%H5251>ensign<s%> on a <S%H1389>hill<s%>.

And therefore will the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2442>wait<s%>, that he may be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> unto <S%H7311>you<s%>, and therefore will he be exalted, that he may have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> upon <S%H3068>you<s%>: for the Lord is a <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment<s%>: <S%H835>blessed<s%> are all they that wait for <S%H2442>him<s%>.

For the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: you shall <S%H1058>weep<s%> no <S%H1058>more<s%>: he will be <S%H2603>very<s%> <S%H2603>gracious<s%> unto you at the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H2199>cry<s%>; when he shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H6030>it<s%>, he will answer you.

And though the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H6862>adversity<s%>, and the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H3906>affliction<s%>, yet shall not your <S%H3384>teachers<s%> be removed into a <S%H3670>corner<s%> any <S%H5869>more<s%>, but your eyes shall <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H3384>teachers<s%>:

And your <S%H241>ears<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> <S%H559>you<s%>, saying, This is the <S%H1870>way<s%>, walk you in <S%H3212>it<s%>, when you turn to the right <S%H541>hand<s%>, and when you turn to the <S%H8041>left<s%>.

You shall <S%H2930>defile<s%> also the <S%H6826>covering<s%> of your engraved <S%H6456>images<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and the <S%H642>ornament<s%> of your molten <S%H4541>images<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>: you shall cast them <S%H2219>away<s%> as a menstruous <S%H1739>cloth<s%>; you shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H3318>it<s%>, Go away.

Then shall he <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H4306>rain<s%> for your <S%H2233>seed<s%>, that you shall <S%H2232>sow<s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%> <S%H3899>with<s%>; and bread of the <S%H8393>increase<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>, and it shall be <S%H1879>fat<s%> and <S%H8082>plentiful<s%>: in that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall your <S%H4735>cattle<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> in <S%H7337>large<s%> <S%H3733>pastures<s%>.

The <S%H504>oxen<s%> likewise and the young <S%H5895>donkeys<s%> that <S%H5647>plow<s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2548>clean<s%> <S%H1098>food<s%>, which has been <S%H2219>winnowed<s%> with the <S%H7371>shovel<s%> and with the <S%H4214>fork<s%>.

And there shall be upon every <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, and upon every <S%H5375>high<s%> <S%H1389>hill<s%>, <S%H6388>rivers<s%> and <S%H2988>streams<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H2027>slaughter<s%>, when the <S%H4026>towers<s%> <S%H5307>fall<s%>.

Moreover the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H3842>moon<s%> shall be as the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H2535>sun<s%>, and the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H2535>sun<s%> shall be <S%H7659>sevenfold<s%>, as the <S%H216>light<s%> of <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> binds <S%H2280>up<s%> the <S%H7667>breach<s%> of his <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H7495>heals<s%> the <S%H4273>stroke<s%> of their <S%H4347>wound<s%>.

<S%H8034>Behold<s%>, the name of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> from <S%H4801>far<s%>, <S%H1197>burning<s%> with his <S%H639>anger<s%>, and the <S%H4858>burden<s%> there is <S%H3514>heavy<s%>: his <S%H8193>lips<s%> are <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H2195>indignation<s%>, and his <S%H3956>tongue<s%> as a <S%H398>devouring<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%>:

And his <S%H7307>breath<s%>, as a <S%H7857>overflowing<s%> <S%H5158>stream<s%>, shall reach to the <S%H2673>midst<s%> of the <S%H6677>neck<s%>, to <S%H5130>sift<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> with the <S%H5299>sieve<s%> of <S%H7723>vanity<s%>: and there shall be a <S%H7448>bridle<s%> in the <S%H3895>jaws<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, causing them to <S%H8582>err<s%>.

You shall have a <S%H7892>song<s%>, as in the <S%H3915>night<s%> when a <S%H6942>holy<s%> <S%H2282>feast<s%> is <S%H6942>kept<s%>; and <S%H8057>gladness<s%> of <S%H3824>heart<s%>, as when one <S%H1980>goes<s%> with a <S%H2485>flute<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, to the mighty <S%H6697>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall cause his <S%H1935>glorious<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%> to be <S%H8085>heard<s%>, and shall <S%H7200>show<s%> the lighting <S%H5183>down<s%> of his <S%H2220>arm<s%>, with the <S%H2197>indignation<s%> of his <S%H639>anger<s%>, and with the <S%H3851>flame<s%> of a <S%H398>devouring<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%>, with <S%H5311>scattering<s%>, and <S%H2230>storm<s%>, and <S%H68>hailstones<s%>.
For through the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%> be beaten <S%H2865>down<s%>, <S%H5221>struck<s%> with a <S%H7626>rod<s%>.

And in every <S%H3605>place<s%> where the <S%H4145>grounded<s%> <S%H4294>staff<s%> shall <S%H4569>pass<s%>, which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H5117>lay<s%> upon <S%H8596>him<s%>, it shall be with tabrets and <S%H3658>harps<s%>: and in <S%H4421>battles<s%> of <S%H8573>shaking<s%> will he fight with <S%H3898>it<s%>.

For <S%H8613>Tophet<s%> is <S%H6186>ordained<s%> of <S%H865>old<s%>; <S%H4428>Yes<s%>, for the king it is <S%H3559>prepared<s%>; he has made it <S%H6009>deep<s%> and <S%H7337>large<s%>: the <S%H4071>pile<s%> there is <S%H784>fire<s%> and <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>; the <S%H5397>breath<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, like a <S%H5158>stream<s%> of <S%H1614>brimstone<s%>, does kindle <S%H1197>it<s%>.
